meanings.definition: Consisting of three parts or elements.
meanings.sent1: The trinary necklace had three beautiful gems on it.
meanings.sent2: The trinary flag had three different colors representing unity.
meanings.sent3: The trinary puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her trinary personality traits made her unique among her friends.
meanings.sent5: The trinary structure of the building stood out in the city skyline.

meanings.sent1: The trinary decision left him torn between three equally good choices.
meanings.sent2: The trinary voting system allowed for a fair representation of opinions.
meanings.sent3: Choosing a trinary dessert was a delightful dilemma.
meanings.sent4: Her trinary outfit decision turned heads at the party.
meanings.sent5: The trinary menu offered a variety of options for every taste.
